title: LF Plat+ Support | 2nd of May Online Tournament | Entry Fee Paid
body:
**_No time wasters please._** Looking for a plat+ support who knows what they're doing. Reply with your Skype or add me in-game if you're interested. You'll be supporting a Season 4 and 5 Diamond ADC. 

Tournament Details: http://binarybeast.com/xLoL1504259/

replies.body: hey im interested but still learning as a support, currently in plat 3 but il use ign Wolves cause it has more champions. skype is ocewolves if you keen to try out a couple of games
